explains: n. 解毒药，解毒剂；矫正方法，对策

sentences.en: There is no known antidote to the poison.
sentences.cn: 这种毒的解药尚未发现。

sentences.en: Massage is a wonderful antidote to stress.
sentences.cn: 按摩是一种极妙的对抗压力的良方。

sentences.en: When he returned, he noticed their sickness and prepared an antidote.
sentences.cn: 当他返回时，他注意到了他们的病情，准备了解毒药。
